articles.title: American-born Eileen Gu makes no apologies about winning Olympic gold for China - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: American-born Eileen Gu struck back at her many critics by winning the gold medal in the debut of freeski big air and then defiantly answering questions about why she spurned Team USA to represent China at the Beijing Games.

articles.title: Eileen Gu is the poster child for a new type of Chinese athlete. But one wrong move could send her tumbling - CNN
articles.description: At this year's Beijing Winter Olympics, the face of China's sporting dreams is undeniably American.
articles.content:
Hong Kong (CNN)At this year's Beijing Winter Olympics, the face of China's sporting dreams is undeniably American.
Freestyle skier Eileen Gu's rise to the top has been meteoric -- and her popularity… [+8890 chars]
